resourcePack.subtle_effects.biome_water_: Water particles match biome water color
config.subtle_effects.blocks.sparks.remo: Removes the vanilla lava spark particle from campfires
config.subtle_effects.blocks.sparks.lava:
§cWARNING!§r
This can cause severe lag for slower computers when around large pools of lava (like in the nether)
config.subtle_effects.blocks.updatedSmok: Replace the old black and gray smoke particles with new campfire style particles
config.subtle_effects.blocks.steam.lavaF: Replaces the smoke particles with steam when lava and water create a block (obsidian/cobblestone/stone)
config.subtle_effects.blocks.steam.repla: Replaces the vanilla smoke particles emitted from food cooking on a campfire with steam particles
config.subtle_effects.blocks.steam.spong: Replaces the cloud particles when a sponge is dried out in the nether with steam
config.subtle_effects.blocks.steam.repla: Replaces the vanilla smoke particles spawned on lava/campfires/magma blocks with steam
config.subtle_effects.blocks.steam.lavaC: Adds lava cauldrons to the list of blocks that can cause rain to create steam
config.subtle_effects.blocks.steam.steam: Should water steam when near blocks with a light level greater than 11
config.subtle_effects.blocks.steam.boili: Should water bubble/boil when near blocks with a light level of 13 or more
config.subtle_effects.blocks.steam.steam: Should water cauldrons steam when near blocks with a light level greater than 11
config.subtle_effects.blocks.steam.boili: Should water bubble/boil when near blocks with a light level of 13 or more
config.subtle_effects.blocks.steam.steam: The light level at which water will steam
config.subtle_effects.blocks.steam.boili: The light level at which water will bubble (boil). The value cannot be lower than the value of Steaming Threshold
config.subtle_effects.blocks.redstoneDus: Blocks that emit redstone dust particles, good for applying the particles to blocks from mods that add redstone block variants, e.g. Polished, Chiseled
config.subtle_effects.blocks.glowstoneDu: Blocks that emit glowstone dust particles, good for applying the particles to blocks from mods that add glowstone block variants, e.g. Polished, Chiseled
config.subtle_effects.blocks.beehivesHav: Display Z particles in front of bee hives/nests at night
config.subtle_effects.blocks.fallingBloc: A list of blocks that that can spawn dust particles. Used by, 'Falling Dust', 'Land Dust', and 'Weak Support Dust'
Do falling blocks have a trail of dust
The distance in blocks a falling block must fall before spawning dust
Should a small puff of dust appear from around the edges of falling blocks when landing on the ground
Plays the block place sound when a falling block lands on the ground
When a falling block is on a weak support block, e.g. non full/solid blocks, dust particles will fall from the bottom of the falling block
config.subtle_effects.blocks.dragonEggPa: Should the dragon egg have particles like the ender chest
config.subtle_effects.blocks.replaceEndP: Replaces the normal end portal smoke particles with nether portal particles so that it is consistent with end gateways
config.subtle_effects.blocks.pumpkinCarv: Display the destroy particle effect when carving a pumpkin
config.subtle_effects.blocks.anvilBreakP: Display the destroy particle effect when an anvil breaks
config.subtle_effects.blocks.anvilUsePar: Should spark particles fly off anvils when used
config.subtle_effects.blocks.grindstoneU: Should spark particles fly off grindstones when used
config.subtle_effects.blocks.smithingTab: Should spark particles fly off smithing tables when used
config.subtle_effects.blocks.stonecutter: Should block destroy particles fly off stonecutters when used
config.subtle_effects.blocks.cauldronCle: Plays a sound when an item is cleaned e.g. Using a dyeable item/banner/shulker box on a water cauldron
config.subtle_effects.blocks.compostingC: Should compost looking particles be spawned when composting items
config.subtle_effects.blocks.compostingI: Should item particles be spawned when composting items
config.subtle_effects.blocks.commandBloc: Should command blocks have particles like in MC Story Mode
config.subtle_effects.blocks.slimeBlockB: Slime bounce sounds when bouncing on a slime block
config.subtle_effects.blocks.beaconParti:
Should beacons emit particles that float up.

§cWARNING!§r
This can cause severe lag for slower computers when around a beacon, potentially adding up to a couple of thousand particles at one time per beacon
config.subtle_effects.blocks.respawnAnch: Crying obsidian particles for respawn anchors
config.subtle_effects.blocks.beehiveShea: Display the destroy particle effect when shearing a beehive/nest
config.subtle_effects.blocks.endPortalPa: Should end portals and end gateways have little colored particles floating around them
config.subtle_effects.blocks.leavesDecay: Play the destroy block sound and particle effects when leaves decay/despawn
config.subtle_effects.blocks.farmlandDes: Play the destroy block sound and particle effects when a mob/player destroys farmland
config.subtle_effects.blocks.amethystSpa:
Blocks that emit amethyst sparkle particles, not including amethyst clusters/buds, good for applying the particles to blocks from mods that add amethyst variants, e.g. Polished, Chiseled.
'Amethyst Sparkle Display Type' must be set to 'ON'
Should amethyst crystals randomly play the amethyst chime sounds
config.subtle_effects.blocks.sculkShriek: Should a sculk soul particle spawn when a sculk shrieker is broken
config.subtle_effects.blocks.sculkCataly: Should a sculk soul particle spawn when a sculk catalyst is broken
config.subtle_effects.blocks.lavaCauldro: Apply lava sounds and particles to lava cauldrons
config.subtle_effects.blocks.enderEyePla: The lifetime of the effect in ticks
Ender Eye Placed Particles Display Type
config.subtle_effects.blocks.endPortalFr: Ender Eye Placed Particles Display Type
config.subtle_effects.blocks.replaceOmin: Replaces the vanilla orange connection particles when near a ominous vault with blue particles
config.subtle_effects.blocks.rainWaterRi: Should ripple particles be spawned on water when its raining
config.subtle_effects.blocks.underwaterB: Should breaking blocks underwater spawn bubbles
config.subtle_effects.blocks.decoratedPo: Should decorated pots spawn bubbles when underwater
config.subtle_effects.blocks.openingChes: When a chest is opened underwater should it spawn bubbles
config.subtle_effects.blocks.randomChest: Random Chest Opening Needs Soul Sand
Player Snore Chance

A percentage based chance for a player to snore. This is UUID based so it doesn't change every night.
0 to disable
Player Snore Sound Volume
0 to disable player snoring sounds
Players Have Sleeping Zs
Display Z particles for sleeping players
Villager Snore Chance

A percentage based chance for a villager to snore. This is UUID based so it doesn't change every night.
0 to disable
Villager Snore Sound Volume
0 to disable to disable villager soring sounds
Villagers Have Sleeping Zs
Display Z particles for sleeping villagers
Foxes Have Sleeping Zs
Display Z particles for sleeping foxes
Bats Have Sleeping Zs
Display Z particles for resting/hanging bats
Cats Have Sleeping Zs
Display Z particles for resting/laying cats
Other Mobs Have Sleeping Zs
Display Z particles for other sleeping mobs, mainly mobs other mods
Display Sleeping Zs Only When Snoring
Forces Z particles to only display when a mob's UUID chance allows them to snore (Only applicable for players and villagers)
Adjust Name Tag When Sleeping
Adjust name tag rendering to be at the top of the head rather than above it when a mob is sleeping in a bed
config.subtle_effects.entities.humanoids: When a player is in a cold biome steam will emit from the their face
The time between frosty breathing spawning in ticks

Seasons for frosty breath to spawn.
'Default' will start frosty breath spawning in the late autumn and end it at the end of early spring

§6Note:§r
Serene Seasons needs to be installed
A list of additional biomes that the effect does not already detect

When the player's hunger gets below this point a stomach growl sound will play every 15 sec.
Value measured in half hunger points.
0 to disable
The time between stomach growl sounds playing

When the player's health gets below this point a heart beat sound will play every 3 sec and every 1 sec when the player's health is below half this value.
Value measured in half hearts.
0 to disable
The time between heart beat sounds playing
Should breath effects e.g. Frosty Breath and Drowning Bubbles, be visible in creative mode
When a player is underwater bubbles will emit from there face
Forces drowning bubbles to spawn in a single column rather that being randomized
Should NPCs, like witches and wandering traders, have potion rings
config.subtle_effects.entities.dustCloud: Should dust clouds be spawned when flying into a wall, like with an elytra
Will prevent dust clouds from rendering within about 2 blocks of the player in first person
Should a cloud of dust appear when a player takes fall damage
Should a cloud of dust appear when a mob takes fall damage
Spawn dust clouds when successfully landing a mace attack
Should a dust cloud form behind a running player
Should a dust cloud form behind charging ravagers, hoglins, zoglins, galloping horses, and dashing camels
Forces player running dust clouds to only spawn if the player is using the speed potion effect
config.subtle_effects.entities.burning.d: Particles emitted from entities on fire
config.subtle_effects.entities.burning.e: When an burning entity is extinguished, from water or a splash water bottle, steam will appear
config.subtle_effects.entities.explosive:
The density of flame particles spawned around primed TNT.
0 to disable
Should entities falling in vanilla fluids have splash effects
Should a ripple effect be played after a splash
Should an eruption of bubbles be spawned underwater
The tint strength of the splash overlay. See 'Splash Overlay Alpha' for explanation of what this config affects

The alpha transparency of the splash overlay. The overlay is the white edge of foam along the top of water splashes. This config also affects the water splash ripple effect 
0 to disable overlay
The velocity threshold needed to trigger a splash
List of entities that will not have splash effects
Plays a second splash effect after the initial splash
Should a ripple effect be played after a secondary splash
The velocity threshold needed to trigger a secondary splash. Cannot be lower than the normal splash velocity threshold
Should entities cause lava splash effects
Should lava splashes play a ripple effect
config.subtle_effects.entities.attackedG: Particles emitted from a mob when it takes damage from a another mob or player
config.subtle_effects.entities.allayMagi:
The density of particles spawning around an allay
0 to disable
config.subtle_effects.entities.vexMagicD:
The density of particles spawning around a vex
0 to disable
config.subtle_effects.entities.sheepShea: When a sheep is sheared fluff particles will fall off
config.subtle_effects.entities.improvedD: Adds more particles to the trail of the Ender Dragon's fireballs
config.subtle_effects.entities.dragonsBr: Applies the lingering potion cloud effects to the ender dragons breath
config.subtle_effects.entities.commandBl: Adds command block particles to the command block minecart. Yes I actually did this
config.subtle_effects.entities.endCrysta: Should end crystals have little pink particles floating around them
config.subtle_effects.entities.minecartS:
Should sparks particles spawn for minecarts moving on rails.
'Land On Rail' will spawn sparks only when a minecart lands on rails
config.subtle_effects.entities.slimeTrai: Do Slimes leave a trail of slime behind them when they move
config.subtle_effects.entities.magmaCube: Do Magma Cubes leave a trail of maga slime behind them when they move
config.subtle_effects.entities.replaceSl: Replaces the slime ball item particles with slime block particles when a slime squishes
config.subtle_effects.entities.replaceOo: Replaces the slime ball item particles with slime block particles for mobs and players with the oozing effect
config.subtle_effects.entities.replaceSp: Replaces the potion effect particles when a spell caster illager is casting a spell e.g Evoker summoning vexes
config.subtle_effects.entities.ironGolem: Should iron particles spawn around iron golems when they crack
config.subtle_effects.entities.spectralA: Should spectral arrows emit glowstone dust particles
config.subtle_effects.entities.wardenDea: Should sculk soul particles emit from wardens upon death
config.subtle_effects.entities.featherTi: Allows baby and weak pandas to be tickled with a feather to sneeze. No slimeballs will drop
config.subtle_effects.entities.villagerW: Should profession/workstation related particles spawn around a workstation when a villager uses it
config.subtle_effects.entities.improvedB: Changes the effects for feeding a brown mooshroom a flower
config.subtle_effects.entities.animalFee: When feeding an animal, e.g. breeding a cow, taming a wolf, item destroy particles will appear around the mouth area
Volume of the eat sounds played when feeding an animal, e.g. breeding a cow, taming a wolf. Note: This will not affect the volume of vanilla animal eating sounds
config.subtle_effects.entities.underwate: When an entity is spawned or dies underwater, should the poof effect have bubbles
config.subtle_effects.entities.improvedW: Improves the water effects of a wolf shaking water off
config.subtle_effects.entities.improvedV: Improves the sweating effects of villagers during raids
config.subtle_effects.environment.biomes:
The radius around the player that biome particles will spawn in
0 to disable all biome particles (vanilla not included)
A list of biome IDs that mushroom spore particles will spawn in

The density of spawned mushroom spores in a biome
0 to disable
A list of biome IDs that pollen particles will spawn in

The density of spawned pollen in a biome
0 to disable
A list of biomes IDs that sculk dust particles will spawn in

The density of spawned sculk dust in a biome
0 to disable
config.subtle_effects.environment.geyser:
The chance for a geyser to spawn
0 to disable
Number of ticks a geyser will be active, value will be somewhat randomized
Number of ticks a geyser will be inactive, value will be somewhat randomized

The chance for a geyser to spawn
0 to disable
Number of ticks a geyser will be active, value will be somewhat randomized
Number of ticks a geyser will be inactive, value will be somewhat randomized

The chance for a geyser to spawn
0 to disable
Number of ticks a geyser will be active, value will be somewhat randomized
Number of ticks a geyser will be inactive, value will be somewhat randomized
config.subtle_effects.environment.firefl: List of dimensions fireflies will not spawn in
List of non solid blocks that fireflies can spawn in/around. Fireflies spawned in habitat biomes will ignore this config

Seasons that fireflies will not spawn during.
'Default' will stop firefly spawning in the late autumn and start them again at the end of early spring

§6Note:§r
Serene Seasons needs to be installed

The type of firefly spawned.
'Original' will spawn fireflies based on the original fireflies shown at Minecraft Live 2021
'Vanilla' will spawn the vanilla fireflies added in the Spring to Life drop
Volume of the buzzing sounds fireflies make
Forces fireflies to only spawn in habitat biomes

Biomes where fireflies have a higher spawn rate and will be more evenly distributed around the biome.
Biomes added to this list must either already be able to spawn fireflies or be in the 'Biomes Allowlist' config, additionally biomes in this list must also not be in the 'Biomes Blocklist' config
config.subtle_effects.environment.waterf: The frequency in ticks that waterfalls will check their validity. This can be a somewhat intense process so higher values are recommended
Should waterfall particles be rotated randomly
The height in blocks that waterfalls will be considered medium
Should medium waterfall particles be visible regardless of the distance from the player
The height in blocks that waterfalls will be considered large
Should large waterfall particles be visible regardless of the distance from the player
config.subtle_effects.items.itemRarity.p: Adds colored particles that float up from items on the ground.

How the item rarity particles are colored.
'Name Color' gets the color from the item's name, if the name color is white than it defaults to 'Rarity Color'.
'Only Color Overrides' will disable particles for all items except for the items specified in 'Color Overrides'
config.subtle_effects.items.itemRarity.m: If 'Particle Color' is set to 'Name Color' when an item with multiple colors in it's name spawns rarity particles they will pick a random color from the item's name
config.subtle_effects.items.itemRarity.u:
Use the item's border color if the item doesn't have a name color

§6Note:§r
Item Borders needs to be installed
config.subtle_effects.items.itemRarity.c: Allows for adding additional colors to specified items. If 'Particle Color Type' is set to 'Only Color Overrides' than only the items in this list will have particles
config.subtle_effects.items.itemRarity.p: How high item rarity particles float
How fast item rarity particles should move
The density of particles spawning around an item
Does not change the vanilla particle effect
The volume of the egg break sound when a thrown egg hits something
Should egg splat particles spawn when breaking an egg

The density of the snowball particle trail.
0 to disable
config.subtle_effects.items.axeStripPart:
Display the destroy particle effect when stripping a block with an axe.
This doesn't affect removing oxidization/wax from copper
config.subtle_effects.items.axeWaxOffPar: Axe Wax Off Particles Display Type
config.subtle_effects.items.boneMealUsin: Should bone meal item particles spawn when using bone meal
config.subtle_effects.items.flintAndStee: Using flint and steel spawns flame and spark particles when lighting a block on fire e.g campfires, candles. This does not affect placing fire
config.subtle_effects.items.increasedIte: Increases the number of item break particles that appear when equipment (e.g. tools/weapons/armor) breaks so the effect is more noticeable
config.subtle_effects.items.waterEvapora: Replaces the smoke particles with steam when water evaporates from a bucket in the nether
config.subtle_effects.items.lingeringPot: Replaces the vanilla bubble swirl particles with wispy clouds
config.subtle_effects.items.splashPotion: Replaces the vanilla bubble swirl particles with poofy clouds
config.subtle_effects.general.particleRe:
The maximum number of chunks away from the player a particle will render.
This does not affect particles spawning/existing in the world only rendering.
This affects most particles in the game including particles from other mods, some particles however ignore this value e.g. campfire smoke.
config.subtle_effects.general.cullPartic: Prevents rendering particles in unloaded chunk. This usually doesn't affect anything, unless the server is running slowing
config.subtle_effects.general.allowUsing: Some particles use a custom render type to blend transparency. This can cause visual issues with other mods. This config allows you to disable the custom render type and use the default transparency render type instead.
config.subtle_effects.general.spellParti: Spell Particles Use Blended Render Type

Changes spell particles to use the custom blended render type. This can cause visual issues with other mods. This config allows you to disable the custom render type and use the default transparency render type instead. This config is ignored if 'Allow Using Blended Render Type' is disabled.
config.subtle_effects.general.fluidDrops: When a drop particle lands in a fluid of the opposite type, e.g. water into lava, a hiss sound will play and steam particles will appear
The volume of the hiss sound played when a drop particle evaporates
config.subtle_effects.general.dropLandIn: When a drop particle lands in a fluid of the same type it will cause a ripple particle
config.subtle_effects.general.dropLandSo:
Volume of the drip sound played when a drop particle lands on the ground or in a fluid. Note, vanilla has sounds for dripstone drop particles and this config will not affect that.
0 to disable
config.subtle_effects.general.poppingHea: Should heart particles play a popping animation before disappearing
config.subtle_effects.general.enchantmen: Configs for the particles go between bookshelves and enchantment tables
config.subtle_effects.general.disableRan: Disables the random shading applied to enchantment particles
config.subtle_effects.general.potionPart: Alpha transparency value for vanilla potion related particles
Alpha transparency value for vanilla potion related particles when close to the player, helpful for making them less intrusive
config.subtle_effects.general.leavesLand: When leaves land on water they will cause a ripple particle
Leaves Landing On Water Keep Momentum
When leaves land on water they will keep their some of their momentum
config.subtle_effects.general.mobSkullSh:
Apply a mob's spectate shader when wearing its skull/head e.g Creeper head makes everything look green.
No new shaders are added
config.subtle_effects.general.fireHeight: The height for the fire screen overlay when burning. 0 is the vanilla fire height
config.subtle_effects.general.fireResist: Prevents fire from rendering in first person while Fire Resistance is active
config.subtle_effects.general.nightVisio: Night vision slowly fades out rather then flashing
The length night vision fading in ticks
